definitions.body: (baal is (our, my, his) advocate (?), cf. Nes:Eg. 120 Dr:284:4; but Grau:Prop. N. 201 thinks [[מרי בעל]] orig. form = hero of Baal);—

son of Jonathan 1Ch 8:34, [[בָָּעַל]] ´[[מ]]: v:1Ch 8:34, 1Ch 9:40 = [[מְרִי־בַעַל]] (err. ?) v:1Ch 9:40 = [[מְפִיבשֶׁת]] (later change, v. [[בּשֶׁת]] sub [[בושׁ]]) 2Sa 4:4, 2Sa 9:6, 2Sa 9:6, 2Sa 9:10, 2Sa 9:11, 2Sa 9:12, 2Sa 9:12, 2Sa 9:13, 2Sa 16:1, 2Sa 16:4, 2Sa 19:26, 2Sa 19:31, 2Sa 21:7, [[מְפִבשֶׁת]] 2Sa 16:25 (called [[בֶּן־שָׁאוּל]]); LXX in 2 Memfi Bosqe, in 1 Ch (usu.) Meribaal; LXXL Memfibaal in 2 S (exc. 2Sa 4:1, 2Sa 4:2 etc., where notin HCT).
[[מְפִבשֶׁת]] son of saul and Riṣpah, acc. to 2Sa 21:8, LXX (incl. LXXL) Memfibosqe.
